alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Carroll; Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 1:38PM EDT until August 26 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN GRAFTON...NORTHWESTERN BELKNAP AND NORTHWESTERN CARROLL COUNTIES... At 138 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Woodstock to near Groton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lincoln, Plymouth, Meredith, Moultonborough, Grafton, Holderness, Ashland, Groton, Woodstock, Sandwich, Bristol, Center Harber, Hebron, Benton, Dorchester, Ellsworth, Thornton, Livermore, Rumney and Campton. This includes Interstate 93 between mile markers 68 and 102. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
